about_the_game:
Love Is Dangerous is an action adventure game where you'll help Art and Adam spread love around the world! The gameplay is simple, but extremely well done and the pixel art graphics mix the retro style with modern techniques, creating a beautiful and passionate visual style. In this adventure you'll assume the role of Art, a charismatic young man who will become a love superhero with the help of Adam, a hopeful scientist.



Together, Art and Adam will help diverse people through love, traveling through various mind-worlds and discovering the various types of love in the process, which will grant Art new abilities. During their adventures, our heroes will face several robotic enemies that are spreading evil in the world, invading the unprotected world-minds, always with good humor and hope. Will they be able to find the source of evil and prevent it from spreading?

Highlights:

  • Simple gameplay but extremely well done.
  • Pixel art graphics that use modern techniques, mixing the best of the old and the new.
  • Funny and extremely charismatic characters.
  • Engaging story with a powerful message.
  • Cinematics made in a comic book style.
  • Difficulty balanced in the right measure.
  • Extra challenges for those who want a higher layer of difficulty.]

Are You Ready to Spread Love Around the World?
